org.apache.hadoop.fs.PathFilterの使用

  • PathFilterを使用しているパッケージ 
    パッケージ 説明
    org.apache.hadoop.fs
    An abstract file system API.
    org.apache.hadoop.mapred  
    org.apache.hadoop.mapred.lib  
    org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.input  

    • org.apache.hadoop.fsでのPathFilterの使用

      PathFilterを実装しているorg.apache.hadoop.fsのクラス 
      修飾子とタイプ クラスと説明
      class  GlobFilter
      A filter for POSIX glob pattern with brace expansions.
      PathFilter型のパラメータを持つorg.apache.hadoop.fsのメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      FileStatus[] FileSystem.globStatus(Path pathPattern, PathFilter filter)
      Return an array of FileStatus objects whose path names match pathPattern and is accepted by the user-supplied path filter.
      protected org.apache.hadoop.fs.RemoteIterator<LocatedFileStatus> FileSystem.listLocatedStatus(Path f, PathFilter filter)
      Listing a directory The returned results include its block location if it is a file The results are filtered by the given path filter
      FileStatus[] FileSystem.listStatus(Path[] files, PathFilter filter)
      Filter files/directories in the given list of paths using user-supplied path filter.
      FileStatus[] FileSystem.listStatus(Path f, PathFilter filter)
      Filter files/directories in the given path using the user-supplied path filter.
      PathFilter型のパラメータを持つorg.apache.hadoop.fsのコンストラクタ 
      コンストラクタと説明
      GlobFilter(String filePattern, PathFilter filter)
      Creates a glob filter with the specified file pattern and an user filter.

    • org.apache.hadoop.mapredでのPathFilterの使用

      PathFilterを実装しているorg.apache.hadoop.mapredのクラス 
      修飾子とタイプ クラスと説明
      class  OutputLogFilter
      This class filters log files from directory given It doesnt accept paths having _logs.
      PathFilterを返すorg.apache.hadoop.mapredのメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      static PathFilter FileInputFormat.getInputPathFilter(JobConf conf)
      Get a PathFilter instance of the filter set for the input paths.
      PathFilter型のパラメータを持つorg.apache.hadoop.mapredのメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      protected void FileInputFormat.addInputPathRecursively(List<FileStatus> result, FileSystem fs, Path path, PathFilter inputFilter)
      Add files in the input path recursively into the results.
      PathFilter型の型引数を持つorg.apache.hadoop.mapredのメソッド・パラメータ 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      static void FileInputFormat.setInputPathFilter(JobConf conf, Class<? extends PathFilter> filter)
      Set a PathFilter to be applied to the input paths for the map-reduce job.

    • org.apache.hadoop.mapred.libでのPathFilterの使用

      PathFilter型のパラメータを持つorg.apache.hadoop.mapred.libのメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      protected void CombineFileInputFormat.createPool(JobConf conf, PathFilter... filters)
      非推奨です。 
      Use CombineFileInputFormat.createPool(PathFilter...).
      PathFilter型の型引数を持つorg.apache.hadoop.mapred.libのメソッド・パラメータ 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      protected void CombineFileInputFormat.createPool(JobConf conf, List<PathFilter> filters)
      非推奨です。 
      Use CombineFileInputFormat.createPool(List).

    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.inputでのPathFilterの使用

      Get a PathFilter instance of the filter set for the input paths.

      Add files in the input path recursively into the results.
      protected void CombineFileInputFormat.createPool(PathFilter... filters)
      Create a new pool and add the filters to it.
